attributes.additional_details: We the undersigned demand the Sir Irvine Patnick be stripped of his Knighthood. He lied and be-smirched  the good name of the victims  of the Hillsborough Disaster whilst in Public Office as an MP. He has proved he is not a right and proper person to hold office in the name of the realm and as a proven liar he should not be allowed to have any part in Legislation being made for the citizens of Great Britain
